child.name: scxml
child.d: Root element.

child.name: state
child.d: A compound or atomic state. Occurs zero or more times.

child.name: parallel
child.d: A parallel state. Occurs zero or more times.

child.name: final
child.d: A top-level final state in the state machine. Occurs zero or more times. The SCXML processor MUST terminate processing when the state machine reaches this state.

child.name: datamodel
child.d: Defines part or all of the data model. Occurs 0 or 1 times.

child.name: script
child.d: Provides scripting capability. Occurs 0 or 1 times.

child.name: onentry
child.d: Optional element holding executable content to be run upon entering this state.

child.name: onexit
child.d: Optional element holding executable content to be run when exiting this state.

child.name: transition
child.d: Defines an outgoing transition from this state.

child.name: initial
child.d: In states that have substates, an optional child which identifies the default initial state. Any transition which takes the parent state as its target will result in the state machine also taking the transition contained inside the initial element.

child.name: state
child.d: Defines a sequential substate of the parent state.

child.name: parallel
child.d: Defines a parallel substate.

child.name: final
child.d: Defines a final substate.

child.name: history
child.d: A child pseudo-state which records the descendant state(s) that the parent state was in the last time the system transitioned from the parent.

child.name: datamodel
child.d: Defines part or all of the data model.

child.name: invoke
child.d: Invokes an external service.

child.name: onentry
child.d: Holds executable content to be run upon entering the parallel element.

child.name: onexit
child.d: Holds executable content to be run when exiting this element.

child.name: transition
child.d: Defines an outgoing transition from this state.

child.name: state
child.d: Defines a parallel substate region.

child.name: parallel
child.d: Defines a nested set of parallel regions.

child.name: history
child.d: A child which represents the state configuration that this state was in the last time the system transitioned from it.

child.name: datamodel
child.d: Defines part or all of the data model.

child.name: invoke
child.d: Invokes an external service.

child.name: transition
child.d: Default initial state for a complex state element.

child.name: onentry
child.d: Optional element holding executable content to be run upon entering this state.

child.name: onexit
child.d: Optional element holding executable content to be run when exiting this state.

child.name: donedata
child.d: Optional element specifying data to be included in the done.state.id or done.invoke.id event.

child.name: transition
child.d: A transition whose 'target' specifies the default history configuration.

child.name: data
child.d: Data element.

child.name: content
child.d: Data to include.

child.name: param
child.d: Data to include.

child.name: content
child.d: Data to include.

child.name: param
child.d: Data to include.

child.name: content
child.d: Data to send.

child.name: param
child.d: Data to send.

child.name: content
child.d: Data to send.

child.name: param
child.d: Data to send.

child.name: finalize
child.d: Executable content to massage the data returned from the invoked component.
